article_title: House bill would allow suicide for terminally ill
article_text:
Thank you for reading 12 free articles on our site. og.description: The national debate over the right for a terminally ill individual to die on his or her terms – assisted by a lethal dose of prescribed medicine – has entered the North Carolina legislature.
